title: üî• URGENT: Test Electron Performance Tracking on Windows (james@james profile)
description:
## üéØ YOUR MISSION KYLE

Test the **Electron Desktop App** performance tracking on Windows and use **james@james.com** profile so Stephen can see real data!

---

## ‚úÖ WHAT'S ALREADY DONE (DON'T TOUCH!)

### **26+ API Routes Fixed** ‚úÖ
- ‚úÖ `/api/performance` - GET & POST working
- ‚úÖ `/api/time-tracking/*` - All 4 routes fixed
- ‚úÖ All admin/client routes fixed
- ‚úÖ `userId` ‚Üí `staffUserId` migration complete
- ‚úÖ Time tracking working perfectly
- ‚úÖ NaN bug fixed in frontend

### **Why You're Needed**
Stephen's Mac can't track properly:
- ‚ùå No Accessibility permissions
- ‚ùå Missing native dependencies (ARM64)
- ‚ùå All metrics show zeros

You need to test on **Windows** where tracking DOES work!

---

## üìã YOUR TASKS

### **1. Setup & Run**
```bash
cd "/path/to/gamified-dashboard (1)"
git pull origin full-stack-StepTen
pnpm install
pnpm dev  # Terminal 1
pnpm electron  # Terminal 2
```

### **2. Login & Test**
- **Email:** james@james.com
- **Password:** (Get from Stephen)
- Go to **Performance** page
- Click "Sync Now"

### **3. Verify Tracking (30+ minutes)**
Leave Electron running and use computer normally.

**Expected Results:**
- Mouse movements: 5,000+
- Mouse clicks: 500+
- Keystrokes: 1,000+
- Active time: 25+ min
- Idle time: 5 min
- Apps used: 3-5
- URLs visited: 10-20
- Productivity score: 60-85%

**NOT this (Mac results):**
- Everything: 0
- NaN% (this is fixed)

### **4. Test Time Tracking**
- Go to Time Tracking page
- Clock In
- Wait 5 minutes
- Clock Out
- Verify hours calculated

### **5. Document Results**
Create file: `KYLE-TESTING-RESULTS.md`

Include:
- Windows version
- Test duration
- Actual metrics captured
- Screenshots (2-3)
- Bugs found/fixed
- Status: ‚úÖ Working / ‚ö†Ô∏è Partial / ‚ùå Not Working

---

## üêõ KNOWN ISSUES

### **Issue 1: `iohook` Not Installing**
```bash
pnpm remove iohook
pnpm add iohook@0.9.3 --save-optional
pnpm rebuild iohook
```

### **Issue 2: Port 3000 In Use**
```bash
pkill -f "next dev"
pkill -f "pnpm dev"
pnpm dev
```

### **Issue 3: Blank Electron Screen**
1. Start Next.js server first
2. Wait 20 seconds
3. Then start Electron

---

## üîç TROUBLESHOOTING

**No Data Syncing?**
- Check terminal: `[SyncService] Metrics sent successfully: 201`
- If `401 Unauthorized`: re-login
- If `500 Error`: check server logs

**Still Seeing Zeros?**
- Check Windows permissions
- Verify `iohook` installed
- Check `electron/services/performanceTracker.js`

---

## üìö REFERENCE FILES

**Documentation:**
- `KYLE-ELECTRON-PERFORMANCE-TRACKING.md` - Full instructions
- `PERFORMANCE-API-FIXES-OCT-15.md` - What was fixed
- `ELECTRON-READY-FOR-KYLE.md` - Setup guide

**Code:**
- API: `app/api/performance/route.ts`
- UI: `components/performance-dashboard.tsx`
- Tracker: `electron/services/performanceTracker.js`
- Auth: `lib/auth-helpers.ts`

---

## üöÄ WHEN YOU'RE DONE

1. Create `KYLE-TESTING-RESULTS.md` with results
2. Take screenshots of Performance page
3. Commit & push:
   ```bash
   git add .
   git commit -m "Kyle: Performance tracking tested on Windows - [STATUS]"
   git push origin full-stack-StepTen
   ```
4. Update this Linear task with results
5. Notify Stephen: "Oi mate, tracking is working! Check james@james profile!"

---

## ‚ö†Ô∏è CRITICAL REMINDERS

1. **USE james@james.com** - Stephen needs to see this!
2. **TEST ON WINDOWS** - Mac won't work
3. **RUN 30+ MINUTES** - Need real data
4. **DON'T BREAK SHIT** - Only fix Electron bugs
5. **DOCUMENT EVERYTHING** - Proof it works!

---

## üéØ SUCCESS CRITERIA

‚úÖ Electron app runs on Windows
‚úÖ Login as james@james works
‚úÖ Performance metrics showing real data (not zeros)
‚úÖ Mouse/keyboard tracking working
‚úÖ Apps/URLs being tracked
‚úÖ Productivity score calculating (not NaN)
‚úÖ Time tracking working
‚úÖ Data persists after app restart
‚úÖ Stephen can view data in admin panel

---

**ALL THE API WORK IS DONE. YOUR JOB:**
- Verify Electron tracking works on Windows
- Fix any Electron-side bugs
- Prove we can track real staff activity

**STEPHEN IS COUNTING ON YOU! üî•**
